Download OIDI Flag

Download the official International Organization for Identity Documents (OIDI) flag in your preferred format and color variant.

Available Formats

SVG Format (Recommended)

Vector graphics format that scales perfectly at any size without quality loss.

Black Variant

Official black version for documents and formal usage

Download SVG

Navy Variant

Navy blue version for digital and web applications

Download SVG

Usage License

These flag files are provided for official use in connection with the International Organization for Identity Documents (OIDI). Please review our usage guidelines before implementing the flag in your materials.

Need Help?

If you need additional formats or have questions about flag usage, please contact us.
